snippet.title: Far Away Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
We are extremely excited to introduce Far Away, a unique visual novel game developed by HongCha Games. These amazing developers consist of various producers and artists behind great works like Touhou Project content, Arknights and Girls Frontline
Through this game, the HongCha team give their take on the themes of corruption, gangs and politics.
With every decision you make, a butterfly effect of events will change the world around the protagonist, Krosa Nonet, and lead her to discover new secrets in the fictional city of Bedjan. Will you be able to piece together the mystery in time to save the city, and the world?

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1250760/_Far_Away/

Keep up to date with our game through our social media.

Follow X.D. Network on Twitter: https://twitter.com/XD_EN_Official
Publisher Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/XDNetworkInc/
